file_content.text: I'm sure we haven't met.
Meet the man in the cantina. I can't tell you anything else.
A second of your time, please.
Ah, and you have colleagues. Unexpected but no matter.
Minder Twenty. Imperial Intelligence.
What exactly is "Imperial Intelligence"?
Imperial Intelligence?
The information gathering and internal security arm of the Empire. We report to the Minister of Intelligence, who reports directly to the Dark Council.
I'm assuming you have Keeper's clearance to approach me for this?
Is this an official mission?
Cleared and processed. No point in dodging procedure.
Sure you're looking for me?
Not at all. Our files are very thorough.
Good to see you.
Is this a job offer?
As long as you can be discreet.
I have little time right now.
You are new faces on Dromund Kaas. A unique group in a unique situation.
You are a new face on Dromund Kaas. That presents a unique opportunity and a small window in which to use it.
I need you to meet a man. Go where he says and do what he asks. There is little danger, but you must not question him.
I've never played spy before. Tell me where to go.
Intriguing. I'm in.
Brief me and I'll begin right away.
Of course.
I'll play your game, but if this is some sort of setup, I'll hunt you down.
This better be legitimate.
Noted.
Of course, my lord.
Going into a situation I don't understand makes me nervous, but I'll do what I must.
I'd prefer not working blind.
The man is named Manda, and he is in a local cantina. Tell him the Lord of Sorrow sent you.
Good luck. We will not speak again.
Sounds like a setup to me. Get another sucker.
No way. [Refuse quest]
Very well. Good day to you.
A new face on Dromund Kaas. Interesting.
Hunter, a moment please.
My lord. A moment please.
Agent, excellent. I was hoping I'd catch you.
